Ehm, before this patch it didn't do anything. Now I can play, but I can't save since GamesFWL is asking for my cd key for Bioshock. How do I fix this?

n3xion: simply go to "create new profile" in the GFWL dashboard in game, but instead of agreeing to the rights for joining LIVE, read along and you'll see a link to "create offline profile". This is how it should be done for most (not-un-pirated) Games for Windows Live.  eg- Grand Theft Auto 4.
